home.heroSubtitle: Complete your exhibition with just a conversation

pricing.title: SERVICE PRICE

mypage.title: My Page
mypage.myExhibitionsDesc: Manage your exhibitions and change publication settings.

exhibition.title: Online Exhibition
exhibition.subtitle: Enjoy diverse AI-curated exhibitions in virtual galleries
exhibition.isPrivateDesc: Only you can see this exhibition
exhibition.deleteWarning: Deleting this exhibition will also delete all artworks and cannot be undone.
exhibition.deleteExhibitionConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this exhibition?
All artworks will also be deleted and cannot be recovered.
exhibition.deleteArtworkConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this artwork?
Deleted artworks cannot be recovered.

about.serviceDesc: Art Wizard is an AI-powered digital curator service. We help artists and curators plan exhibitions, create promotional materials, and publish exhibitions online.
about.aiCuratorDesc: Plan your exhibition through conversation with a chatbot. AI generates exhibition titles, introductions, prefaces, and artwork descriptions.
about.virtualSpaceDesc: Display your works in a 2.5D virtual gallery and share with the world.
about.exhibitionPackageDesc: We provide all materials needed for exhibitions including posters, PDF catalogs, and marketing reports.

notice.title: Notices
notice.mvpReleaseDesc: The first version of Art Wizard has been released. Plan your exhibition with the AI Curator!
notice.virtualFeatureDesc: Display your works in a 2.5D virtual gallery and share with the world.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your display name and bio for the service.
profile.name: Name
profile.updateError: An error occurred while updating profile.

chat.welcomeMessage:
Hello! I'm the AI Curator of Art Wizard. üé®

What kind of exhibition are you planning? Feel free to tell me about the theme, concept, and mood of your exhibition!
chat.pageSubtitle: Develop your exhibition ideas through conversation with the AI Curator
chat.chatAtLeastOnce: Please chat with the AI Curator at least once
chat.generatingContentDesc: AI is generating exhibition introduction, preface, artist bio, and artwork descriptions...
chat.uploadTimeout: Upload timed out. The image file may be too large.
chat.contentGenerationError: An error occurred while generating content.

keywords.title: Enter Exhibition Keywords
keywords.subtitle: Enter 3-10 keywords representing the core theme or concept of your exhibition.

imageUpload.dragOrClick: Drag or click to upload images
imageUpload.invalidFileType: Only JPG, PNG, WebP files are allowed.

titleSelector.title: Select Exhibition Title
titleSelector.subtitle: Choose one of the 5 AI-generated titles.
titleSelector.generationError: Error generating titles. Please try again.

contentPreview.title: Exhibition Info Preview
contentPreview.subtitle: Review the generated exhibition info and proceed to the next step.

metadata.title: Exhibition Information
metadata.subtitle: Enter exhibition details. This information will be used for posters and other materials.
metadata.endDateAfterStart: End date must be after start date

artworkEditor.title: Edit Artwork Information
artworkEditor.subtitle: Enter titles and descriptions for each artwork. If skipped, default titles ("Artwork 1", "Artwork 2", etc.) will be used.

curation.editGuideDesc: Click each section to edit or regenerate with AI.
curation.introDesc: Briefly introduces the core theme and intent of the exhibition.
curation.prefaceDesc: Covers the background, meaning, and artist's work in depth.
curation.artistBioDesc: Introduces the artist's background, methodology, and artistic world.
curation.marketingDesc: Presents collection value and marketing points for collectors.

marketing.title: Marketing Report
marketing.generatingDesc: AI is analyzing the exhibition information to generate a marketing report...
marketing.generationError: An error occurred while generating the marketing report

pressRelease.title: Press Release
pressRelease.generatingDesc: AI is generating a press release based on your exhibition information...
pressRelease.generationError: An error occurred while generating the press release

content.regenerationError: An error occurred while regenerating content.
content.saveError: An error occurred while saving content.

virtual.title: Exhibition Complete
virtual.subtitle: Exhibition planning is complete! Create a virtual exhibition or download the package.
virtual.onlineExhibitionDesc: Display your works in a 2.5D virtual gallery and share with the world.
virtual.downloadPackageDesc: Download preface, introduction, press release, and marketing report as PDF.
virtual.publishedSuccess: Exhibition has been published to online gallery!
virtual.pdfDownloadSuccess: Exhibition package has been downloaded successfully.

complete.title: Exhibition Planning Complete!
complete.subtitle: AI Curator has successfully planned your exhibition.
complete.publishDesc: Once published, everyone can view your exhibition in the online gallery.
complete.publishedDesc: Everyone can now view your exhibition.

poster.title: Exhibition Poster Generation
poster.subtitle: Create professional posters to promote your exhibition.
poster.selectImageDesc: Select an image to use for your poster
poster.confirmInfoDesc: The information below will be displayed on the poster
poster.selectImageError: Please select an image for the poster.
poster.generationError: An error occurred while generating the poster.
poster.serviceError: Poster generation service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
poster.referenceImageDesc: Select one of your uploaded artworks to more accurately reflect its colors and mood

errors.uploadTimeout: Upload timed out. The image file may be too large.
errors.uploadTimeoutSolution: Solutions: 1. Try reducing the image file size. 2. Check your internet connection. 3. Try again later.
errors.contentGenerationError: An error occurred during content generation
errors.pdfServiceUnavailable: PDF generation service unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.pdfTimeout: PDF generation timed out. There may be too many or large images.
errors.pdfMemoryError: PDF generation failed due to memory shortage.
